nodes.bodyText:
This seems like it would have pretty negative performance implications, as it introduces several reflection calls to every composite element we serialize.
Could this check be moved into the reflection checks that happen when the model is initially scanned? I.e. in the constructor to BaseRuntimeChildDatatypeDefinition or something like that?
@jamesagnew  Thank you for advise. Please have a look to commit 8961a0a .
